name: ESCAPE FROM HOME (VladSandberg)
description:
Team Name

ALLSTARGAMEDEVTEAM

Gameplay Instructions

Follow hints and escape aflame forest. Don't get near fire!

What platform is your game built for?

Windows

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.

- Fast stylized Procedural Sky (Krystian Komisarek) 
- Animal Variety Pack (PROTOFACTOR INC) 
- Rabbit (PROTOFACTOR INC) 
- Water Materials (tharlevfx) 
- Environment Set (NatureManufacture) 
- M5 VFX Vol.2 Fire and Flames (JeongukChoi)
- Stats Plugin (Aleksey Koledintsev)
- Sounds from Soundly

P.S. I have no idea where Download button has gone, so here is a link to Dropbox:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/kddmniyie5df4xz/Allstargamedevteam_EscapeFromHome.rar?...
